quotes.qt-desc: Some relations never knew physical boundaries whereas some relations had always been practising Social Distancing
There is a woman behind every man's success. Well, I meant my 100% attendance, daily bathing and trendy hairstyles to classroom.
Thanks to November 14th of every year for making me regret the biggest mistake I wanted as a child 'I want to grow old'
The distance between DHONI & final and The duration between NZ & 4 years
My stories kept their eyes open just to see your eyes on them
Once in a year, Amidst those crowded messages, my eyes waited for your message to flash the screen.
When backspaces prevent you from starting a conversation with her
That last 10 minutes before your final exam when the ends of your mouth slightly curve up to embrace the upcoming holidays.
